Question.Subject: Why does my internet keep crashing?
Question.Content: I'm using Mozilla FireFox 3.6 I just upgraded it but it still crashes and doesn't respond, wth?! When i go to play FarmVille or go onto Chatroulette, its just freezes and then doesnt respond. What can I do ?
Question.ChosenAnswer:
okay, here is a simple solution Go here: http://www.opera.com/browser/download/
and download Opera Internet browser, it is the fastest and the best one you'll find. That should fix your problem
:)
